data.message:
Hey Facebook, I've always pronounced it Gif(orilla) but recall reading it was originally Gif(iraffe) according to the Guy who originated the format.

I'd love to be able to find this article where I'm pretty sure I made a comment to verify this, but unfortunately it would seem that my Activity log page is failing to load properly.
 Everything else seems to be working just fine from what I can tell, any ideas on what would cause such an error? 
I've tried clearing my browser cache & cookies, reset my router etc. but no luck.  :(
